title: array of functions
extract: By Vangie Beal In spreadsheets an array formula is a formula that will perform multiple calculations on one or more sets of values. The array formula will return a single result or multiple results. In Microsoft Excel an array formula an array formula is enclosed between braces: { }.
extract_html: By Vangie Beal In spreadsheets an array formula is a formula that will perform multiple calculations on one or more sets of values. The array formula will return a single result or multiple results. In Microsoft Excel an array formula an array formula is enclosed between braces: { }.
